author: Staff Reporter
text:
Revenue officials on Tuesday seized a lorry, tractor, and an earth mover from Avinashi. Tahsildar (Avinashi) M. Shanmugam said that the lorry and tractor were carrying illegally mined sand.

The earth mover was seized from Vettuvapalayam from where the sand was being mined. Mr. Shanmugam said around Rs. 75,000 was slapped as fines on the owners of these vehicles.

Children injured

Three children, aged between six and seven, sustained injuries when the car in which they were travelling overturned near Avinashi on Tuesday. The children were stated to be recovering at a hospital.

Arrested

Eleven members of the Akil Bharata Hindu Maha Sabha were arrested when they attempted an agitation near the Tirupur Railway Station on Tuesday evening.

They were demanding that steps should be taken by the government to change the existing rules to facilitate the conduct of jallikattu.
title: Lorry, tractor, earth mover seized
